name: Lord Of Doors V1.0
description:
Lord of Doors v1

For more game news follow my twitter!

 Windows/Mac/Linux

A quirky, emotional and tragic tale of love with cosmic horror.

Your wife is not feeling well, and you are trying your best to keep yourself together. Sometimes that feeling of sorrow and loss happens even before death ever comes. 

What does this game offer? 

-Multiple endings

-Quirky, tragic tale

-Original Soundtrack

-Pixel Art

-Small adventure with some horror twists 

-Cosmic horror

Controls: 

Right Click for options or press ESC

Continue the narrative by clicking when seeing the blinking key. 

Press ctrl to skip scenes rapidly

Select choices and try to get the best ending if you can...

My entry for the Cosmic Horror Jam!
